Typealiases.html#/s:14StreamChatCore13To.name: TokenProvider
Typealiases.html#/s:14StreamChatCore13To.abstract: A token provider is a function in which you send a request to your own backend to get a Stream Chat API token.

Structs/User.html#/s:14StreamChatCore4Us.name: online
Structs/User.html#/s:14StreamChatCore4Us.abstract: An indicator if a user is online.

Structs/User.html#/s:14StreamChatCore4Us.name: isCurrent
Structs/User.html#/s:14StreamChatCore4Us.abstract: Check if the user is the current user.

Structs/Reaction.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: isOwn
Structs/Reaction.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Check if the reaction if by the current user.

Structs/MessageRead.html#/s:14StreamChat.name: lastReadDate
Structs/MessageRead.html#/s:14StreamChat.abstract: A last read date by the user.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: showReplyInChannel
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Check if this reply message needs to show in the channel.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: isEphemeral
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Check if the message is ephemeral, e.g. Giphy preview.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: isOwn
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Check if the message is own message of the current user.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: canEdit
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Check if the message could be edited.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: canDelete
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Check if the message could be deleted.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: textOrArgs
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: A combination of message text and command args.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: hasOwnReaction(type:)
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Check if the message has a reaction with the given type from the current user.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: addToOwnReactions(_:reactions:)
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Add a given reaction to the current user own reactions.

Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: deleteFromOwnReactions(_:reactions:)
Structs/Message.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: Delete a given reaction from the current user own reaction.

Structs/ExtraData.html#/s:14StreamChatCo.name: decodableTypes
Structs/ExtraData.html#/s:14StreamChatCo.abstract: A list of a custom extra data type.

Structs/ExtraData.html#/s:14StreamChatCo.name: init(_:)
Structs/ExtraData.html#/s:14StreamChatCo.abstract: Init an extra data with custom data.

Structs/ChannelsQuery.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: messageLimit
Structs/ChannelsQuery.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A number of messages inside each channel.

Structs/ChannelQuery.html#/s:14StreamCha.name: unreadMessageRead
Structs/ChannelQuery.html#/s:14StreamCha.abstract: Unread message state by the current user.

Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:14Stre.name: isCancelled
Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:14Stre.abstract: Check if the action is cancel button.

Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:14Stre.name: isSend
Structs/Attachment/Action.html#/s:14Stre.abstract: Check if the action is send button.

Structs/Attachment.html#/s:14StreamChatC.name: isImage
Structs/Attachment.html#/s:14StreamChatC.abstract: Check if the attachment is an image.

Structs/Attachment/ActionStyle.html.name: ActionStyle
Structs/Attachment/ActionStyle.html.abstract: An attachment action style, e.g. primary button.

Structs/MessageRead.html.name: MessageRead
Structs/MessageRead.html.abstract: A message read state. User + last read date.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: fileSize
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Get a file size from the file URL.

Extensions/UIApplication.html#/s:So13UIA.name: appState
Extensions/UIApplication.html#/s:So13UIA.abstract: The current app state (see AppState), e.g. active, background.

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO14Str.name: error
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO14Str.abstract: Get the error from the result if it failed.

Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si14StreamChatCor.name: shortString()
Extensions/Int.html#/s:Si14StreamChatCor.abstract: A short string for the number, e.g. k, m, b.

Extensions/DateFormatter/Stream.html#/s:.name: iso8601Date(from:)
Extensions/DateFormatter/Stream.html#/s:.abstract: Creates and returns a date object from the specified ISO 8601 formatted string representation.

Extensions/DateFormatter/Stream.html#/s:.name: iso8601DateString(from:)
Extensions/DateFormatter/Stream.html#/s:.abstract: Creates and returns an ISO 8601 formatted string representation of the specified date.

Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.name: streamGzip
Extensions/JSONEncoder.html#/s:10Foundat.abstract: A Stream Chat JSON encoder with a gzipped content.

Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.name: connected(_:)
Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.abstract: Observe a web socket connection and filter not connected statuses.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: log
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: A string of the date for the ClientLogger.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: channelsNextPageSize
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: A default channels page sizefor the next page.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: messagesNextPageSize
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: A default messages page size for the next page.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: limit(_:)
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: The amount of items requested from the APIs.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: greaterThan(_:)
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Filter on ids greater than the given value.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: greaterThanOrEqual(_:)
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Filter on ids greater than or equal to the given value.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: lessThan(_:)
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Filter on ids smaller than the given value.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: lessThanOrEqual(_:)
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Filter on ids smaller than or equal to the given value.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: limit
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: A limit value, if the pagination has it or 0.

Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: offset
Enums/Pagination.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: An offset value, if the pagination has it or 0.

Enums/Filter.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6Fi.name: key(_:_:)
Enums/Filter.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6Fi.abstract: Filter by a given key with a given operator (see Operator).

Enums/AttachmentFileType.html#/s:14Strea.name: init(mimeType:)
Enums/AttachmentFileType.html#/s:14Strea.abstract: Init an attachment file type by mime type.

Enums/AttachmentFileType.html#/s:14Strea.name: init(ext:)
Enums/AttachmentFileType.html#/s:14Strea.abstract: Init an attachment file type by a file extension.

Enums/MessageType.html.name: MessageType
Enums/MessageType.html.abstract: A message type, e.g. regular, ephemeral, reply.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: OpenNewMessageCallback
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A callback type to open a chat view controller with a given message id and channel id.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: openNewMessage
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A callback to open a chat view controller with a given message id and channel id.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: showIfNeeded(newMessage:in:)
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: Show a notification with a given message from a channel if the app in the background.

Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: show(newMessage:in:)
Classes/Notifications.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: Show a notification with a given message from a channel.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: reactionsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: If users are allowed to add reactions to messages. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: typingEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Controls if typing indicators are shown. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: readEventsEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Controls whether the chat shows how far you’ve read. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: repliesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Enables message threads and replies. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: searchEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Controls if messages should be searchable (this is a premium feature). Disabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: mutesEnabled
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: Determines if users are able to mute other users. Enabled by default.

Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.name: messageRetention
Classes/Channel/Config.html#/s:14StreamC.abstract: A number of days or infinite. Infinite by default.

Classes/Channel/DecodingKeys.html#/s:14S.name: cid
Classes/Channel/DecodingKeys.html#/s:14S.abstract: A combination of channel id and type.

Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.name: memberIds
Classes/Channel.html#/s:14StreamChatCore.abstract: A list of user ids of the channel members.

Classes/MVar.html#/s:14StreamChatCore4MV.name: get(defaultValue:)
Classes/MVar.html#/s:14StreamChatCore4MV.abstract: Get the value if exists or return a default value.

Classes/WebSocket/Connection.html#/s:14S.name: isConnected
Classes/WebSocket/Connection.html#/s:14S.abstract: Check if the web socket is connected.

Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: items
Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: A list of UploaderItem for the upload.

Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: init(channel:)
Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Init an uploader for a given channel.

Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: remove(_:)
Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Remove an uploading item and cancel the current uploading state.

Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.name: reset()
Classes/Uploader.html#/s:14StreamChatCor.abstract: Remove all uploading items and cancel all uploading states.s

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:14StreamCha.name: timing(_:reset:)
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:14StreamCha.abstract: Calculate and log a timing from the previous call.

Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:14StreamCha.name: log(_:_:)
Classes/ClientLogger.html#/s:14StreamCha.abstract: Log a data as a pretty printed JSON string.

Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:14StreamCh.name: callbackQueue
Classes/Client/Config.html#/s:14StreamCh.abstract: A request callback queue, default nil (some background thread).

Classes/Client.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6.name: set(user:token:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6.abstract: Setup the current user with a given token.

Classes/Client.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6.name: set(user:_:)
Classes/Client.html#/s:14StreamChatCore6.abstract: Setup the current user with a token provider (see TokenProvider).

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
